events.text:
Alright! These are the basic controls.

Use the left and right arrow keys to move left and right, respectively.

I know you probably thought, "I know this already!"
But it's as they say, "You review the basics to become a master!"
The next action is jumping: hit the spacebar while on the ground to jump. You can only jump once off the ground, and you have to return to the ground in order to jump once more.

To attack with your sword, press Control on your keyboard. You will swing your sword in a sweeping motion that can hit targets directly in front of you.

So, even if the enemy is short, the attack will still hit! Ain't that great!?

And now for the last action: sprinting!

If you hold down Shift, you will enter into a sprint. While sprinting, your running speed is increased and you jump higher!

You cannot sprint forever, though! See that green bar at the top of the screen?

That green bar is your [i]sprint meter[/i]. It goes down while you sprint.

If you let the sprint meter go all the way down, you wll get tired! In this state your speed and jump height are halved.

This effect lasts for around three seconds.
Well now...That is all there is to the basic actions! Onto the next topic!
